sentences.english: Master Demonologist (Felhunter) will now also reduce damage taken by Holy.
sentences.chinese: 惡魔學識大師現在也能減免神聖傷害。

sentences.english: He was respected for his learning by several churchmen and other gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 學識博得了一些牧師和其他紳士們的尊敬。

sentences.english: She learnt so fast that she outlearnt her teacher.
sentences.chinese: 學識上超過了她的老師。

sentences.english: He is a teacher of great scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位學識淵博的教師。

sentences.english: If thou hast wit & learning, add to it Wisdom and Modesty.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有了聰明和學識，就再添上智慧和謙遜吧。

sentences.english: He who imagines that he has knowledge enough has none.
sentences.chinese: 自以爲學識豐富的人是沒有什麼學問的人。

sentences.english: Art education has produced armies of learned bores.
sentences.chinese: 藝術教育同樣造就出了一羣有學識卻令人生厭的人。

sentences.english: Lorekeep, the great city of necromantic magic, lies in ruins .
sentences.chinese: 學識要塞，偉大的巫術魔法之城，現在已是一片廢墟。

sentences.english: who have a lot more experience and knowledge than I do.
sentences.chinese: 這些人比我有更豐富的經歷和更淵博的學識。

sentences.english: His learning came not only from books but from bars and cafs.
sentences.chinese: 他的學識不僅來自於書本，也來自於酒吧和咖啡館。

sentences.english: His breadth of knowledge filled me with admiration.
sentences.chinese: 他學識淵博，令我非常欽佩。

sentences.english: For it is finite in my knowledge , Therefore temporarily analysing up here earlier .
sentences.chinese: 因爲我的學識上有限，所以暫時先分析到這裏。

sentences.english: He uses it very often by concealing it, in fact.
sentences.chinese: 他實際上通過隱藏鋒芒來運用學識。

sentences.english: A little learning is a dangerous thing .
Even what you learn during the four years of university will be sth quite superficial too.
sentences.chinese: 就是大學四年，所授課業也還是相當粗淺的學識。

definition: to surpass others/outstanding/(basketball, soccer etc) to get past an opponent
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
